org.vivoweb.ingest.translate
Class RDFTranslator

java.lang.Object
  org.vivoweb.ingest.util.Task
      org.vivoweb.ingest.translate.RDFTranslator

public class RDFTranslator
extends Task

RDF Tranlator This class translates RDF from its current schema into the VIVO ontology. It uses RDFworkflows to manipulate the data TODO: Identify additional parameters required for translation TODO: Identify the method of invoking an RDF workflow in Jena TODO: Create a sample RDF workflow

Author:
Stephen V. Williams swilliams@ctrip.ufl.edu
